MS MCQs

    User interface essentials in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. On the app bar, you can select the magnifier icon to start searching. Which one of the following statements is true about the function of the magnifier icon?

      You can use the Help function to find business data such as customers, items, and vendors.

      You need to enter the exact name of what you are looking for.

      You can use the Search for page (Tell Me) icon to find pages and reports. The drop-down list changes as you enter more characters.


    2. How can you directly change your role center in Business Central?

      Go to My Settings, and in the Role Center field, select the role center that you want to use.

      You cannot change the role center directly. You need to sign out and then sign in again.

      You cannot change your role center yourself. This action must be done by the administrator in configuration mode.

      Use the search function to search for the Role Center Setup page and assign your user account to the role center that you want to use.


    3. Can a user zoom in to all the data of a page’s underlying table?

      No, there is no zoom functionality on pages in Business Central.

      Yes, but not by default. You will need to install the Zoom app from AppSource first.

      Yes, with the Inspect pages and data feature in Help and Support. You can get details about a page, insight into the page design, the different elements that comprise the page, and the source behind the data that it displays. It allows you to zoom into all the data for the underlying table.

      You can only zoom with the on-premises version of Business Central.
